Uses of Interface
biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.Encoder

  • Packages that use Encoder 
    Package Description
    biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec  
    biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.binary  
    biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.net  

    • Uses of Encoder in biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec

      Subinterfaces of Encoder in biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BinaryEncoder
      Defines common encoding methods for byte array encoders.
      interface  StringEncoder
      Defines common encoding methods for String encoders.

    • Uses of Encoder in biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.binary

      Classes in biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.binary that implement Encoder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Base32
      Provides Base32 encoding and decoding as defined by RFC 4648.
      class  Base64
      Provides Base64 encoding and decoding as defined by RFC 2045.
      class  BaseNCodec
      Abstract superclass for Base-N encoders and decoders.
      class  BinaryCodec
      Converts between byte arrays and strings of "0"s and "1"s.
      class  Hex
      Converts hexadecimal Strings.

    • Uses of Encoder in biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.net

      Classes in biweekly.util.org.apache.commons.codec.net that implement Encoder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BCodec
      Identical to the Base64 encoding defined by RFC 1521 and allows a character set to be specified.
      class  QCodec
      Similar to the Quoted-Printable content-transfer-encoding defined in RFC 1521 and designed to allow text containing mostly ASCII characters to be decipherable on an ASCII terminal without decoding.
      class  QuotedPrintableCodec
      Codec for the Quoted-Printable section of RFC 1521.
      class  URLCodec
      Implements the 'www-form-urlencoded' encoding scheme, also misleadingly known as URL encoding.
